ProbableCases: A 30 year old female from village, with H/O **right ear discharge** since childhood with H/O **hard of hearing** for 5 years and headache for 3 months. On Examination, the patient was having a **central perforation** in the anteroinferior quadrant of the tympanic membrane. TFT showed **Rinne negative**, **Weber** lateralized to **right side **, **ABC - not reduced**.
